item.title: Custom UIScrollview Paging Size
item.description: A scroll view’s paging size is determined by its bound, and there is no way to adjust it. It’s difficult to explain why developer wants to change this size. Consider this calendar scenario where I want to show some preview of the next month. There is one way that you could achieve this, by setting the scroll view’s width with the width of the page you like and set its clipsToBounds to false.

item.title: Bitwise Flags Enum in Swift using OptionSet
item.description: Bitwise Flags using Enum is a technique that is heavily used in the Apple SDK. You can see that Apple tends to use that everywhere from UIKit to Foundation. In Swift, enum doesn’t behave that way. Fact: Did you know enum in Swift can even have methods? Swift want all the enum value to be literal, and 1 << 0 isn’t it. So we’ll have to revise that in to:

item.title: Podcasts that I listen to
item.description: I usually listen to podcasts on the way to work. These are the ones that I’m personally listen to and enjoy. Hope you guys will like it as well. Entertainment Podcasts Serial Season 1 & 2 hosted by Sarah Koenig (superb content, highly recommended) Casefile True Crime (not as good as Serial, but worth mentioning) Learning And Personal Development Podcasts Y Combinator A podcast on starting a startup.

item.title: about
item.description: An iOS Developer who fights with Xcode everyday.
